title: Roche Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) 2024
name: Roche CSR 2024 - Vidyarthi Sahayak Samiti Lajpatrai Vidyarthi Bhavan, Pune
body:
Empowering Young Minds with Problem Solving, Decision Making, and Career Choices
I with my colleague, Bhaskar Shelar had the pleasure of connecting with over 70 eager students from across Maharashtra at Vidyarthi Sahayyak Samiti’s Lala Lajpatrai Vidyarthi Bhavan, all thanks to the Roche Pune CSR team.
Together, we led a session on Problem Solving and Decision Making. Alongside helpful methods to tackle challenges, we also discussed how to make effective career choices by assessing success rates and exploring all possible options. To keep things interactive, we shared interesting scientific facts and included games that made learning fun and engaging.
The students’ energy reminded us of how education can help guide them toward bright futures. In closing, I’d like to thank the Roche CSR committee for believing in us and my colleagues - Sonam Thote, Kruthika C, Shreya Wani, Bhaskar Shelar, Dnyaneshwar Ghuge, Ankit Sanghavi, Rashmi Markhedkar for dedicating their time and sharing their invaluable insights with the students.
